This was one of my first games I downloaded when i got pcvr and this sh*t show will stick in my mind forever. Cheers!

review_title: Running fast, with an i5-2310 and GXT970
one_reviews_text:
Cool, with simplistic scenarios. Running fast, with an modest i5-2310 and a GXT970, in a very fluid and satisfying way. I didn't feel sick on the roller coaster, what miracles did you do?
The problem is that the screen goes black for each change of attraction. Then I have to exit and restart the application, because only one game works at a time.

review_title: Many of the scenes are good.
one_reviews_text: Liitle small problems with starting but it is good, many options many of them are nice,

review_title: not so exciting as the title suggests.
one_reviews_text: it's mostly free, but i didnt enjoy it.
All of the piides and games are stupidly expensive aaaaaand it needs someway to provent butterflies in your somact,wast of cpu memory WOULD NOT RECOMMEND

If you like the free coaster here (and why not try it out, it is free!) then I would recommend the full pack of all the coasters for 9.99. I like the way these coasters have a number of scene changes across the ride, and all of them are as long as varied as the free one (the Western coaster is a favorite of mine). The shooting is done well and there are some nice achievements to be earned that add some replay value. Since this is from the same developer as Epic Roller Coasters, I hope they add a 'race' mode as well, but I'm very happy with my purchase of the complete pack right now (the shooting gallery game is nice, but really it is the coasters that make the dlc worth the purchase and then think of the shooting gallery and ferris wheel ride as a bonus on top)
i love it is the beast.
